Name: MGM Grand
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: Nail the perfect balance and this cognac-based cocktail sings on the palate with cognac, richly subtle cherry, and zesty lemon acidity.
History: A riff on the classic Casino Cocktail , hence the name referencing one of the most famous Las Vegas resort casinos. Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Andrew Loudon at Satan's Whiskers in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of MGM Grand contains 172 calories
